review: A co-worker has one of those camera lens coffee mugs and is always yammering on about how it shows how much he's into photography.So I got this, removed the optics, and turned it into a significantly bigger mug and shut my co-worker up.$25,000 well spent.
productTitle: Sigma 200-500mm f/2.8 APO EX DG Ultra-Telephoto Zoom Lens for Canon DSLR Cameras
